children.description: ''Over the months, Punk4156 and others have attributed the success of CrypToadz in part to its art being public domain.''

children.description: ''Another day, another NFT project, but with the strong network and idiosyncratic art behind this one, it might be in it for the long haul.''

children.name: New York Times • Why My NFT Toad Brought Me Joy
children.description: ''An economy where nobody works a bad job, where cryptocurrencies only go up in value and where financial planning for the future just involves buying more toads.''
